Files | Functions
HRPWM
IP

Files

file  csl_hrpwm.h
 This file contains declarations of CSL APIs corresponding to the HRPWM module. This also contains necessary structure, enum and macro definitions and APIs are consolidated to provide more functional APIs.
 

Functions

int32_t CSL_epwmHrLoadCmpAHrValue2 (uint32_t pwmBaseAddr, uint32_t hrBaseAddr, uint32_t compAHighResVal, uint32_t ShadowToActiveLoadTrigger)
 This API loads Counter-Comparator A high resolution value and also configure the pulse select bits, that select which pulse to use for timing events in the HRPWM module. More...
 

Detailed Description

Function Documentation

int32_t CSL_epwmHrLoadCmpAHrValue2 ( uint32_t  pwmBaseAddr,
uint32_t  hrBaseAddr,
uint32_t  compAHighResVal,
uint32_t  ShadowToActiveLoadTrigger 
)

This API loads Counter-Comparator A high resolution value and also configure the pulse select bits, that select which pulse to use for timing events in the HRPWM module.

Parameters
pwmBaseAddrBase Address of PWM instance used.
hrBaseAddrBase address of the HRPWM register NULL if not applicable for the SOC Please refer to the Technical Reference Manual (TRM) for the details
compAHighResValCounter-comparator A high resolution value
ShadowToActiveLoadTriggerCondition when the active reg to be loaded. This parameter can take values from the following enum
  • CSL_EpwmHrRegActLoad_t;
Return values
CSL_PASSfor success
CSL_EUNSUPPORTED_CMDfor unsupported API on this SOC
Note
For SoCS that do not have HRCTL register, ShadowToActiveLoadTrigger value is not don't care and is not used.
